name: The Spice House
about: Experience authentic cuisine with a modern twist. Our award-winning chefs prepare the finest dishes using locally-sourced ingredients in a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

name: Pizza Corner
about: Hand-tossed pizzas made with love and the finest ingredients. Family-owned since 1985.

name: Burger Palace
about: Gourmet burgers crafted with premium Angus beef and locally-sourced produce. The best burgers in Waterloo!

name: Saigon Social
about: Chef-driven Vietnamese comfort food with a modern New York edge. Expect broths that simmer for 24 hours and herbs harvested from our rooftop garden.

name: Tokyo Tide Sushi
